column4: Anyone knows where I can find"Sound Preferences" in lubuntu11.10?
How can I check the sound hardware reckognized by my ubuntu?
00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation N10/ICH 7 Family High Definition Audio Controller (rev 02)
its me the no sound guy :)
should i paste the outputs of the commands you sent me in PM?
isn't it strange to see a modem listed in the audio devices? could that be the issue?
launched alsamixer, it recon the card and the chip, I can change the volume on some pieces, but "master" is stuck at 0
use the up arroy in your keyboard
yes it works for PCM, MIC & BIP, but no bar for master and impossible to increase the value
Sidewinder1, all thanks a lot its getting late, hopefully will get this sorted sometime, bye
